mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, faq_type FROM faq ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT seq, title, faq_type FROM faq WHERE faq_type = #{faq_type} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq (seq, title, faq_type, content) VALUES ((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from faq), #{title}, #{faq_type}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE seq = #{seq}
